cont.entity_a: The grill is easy to use.
cont.entity_b: Easy to set up. Dishwasher safe components.

Smoke.comm: Produces less smoke than traditional grills.

cont.entity_a: Some smoke may occur with fatty or marinated meats.
Cooks food evenly and provides good grill marks.
cont.entity_b: Heats up quickly and maintains steady temperature.

cont.entity_a: Compact size not for large quantities.
Challenging for thick cuts of meat.
cont.entity_b: May require additional tools for visibility.

cont.entity_a: Durable and holds up well over time.
Recommended for apartment dwellers due to indoor usability.
cont.entity_b: Versatile for both indoor and outdoor use.

cont.entity_a: Sufficient heat for most grilling needs but not comparable to charcoal grills.
cont.entity_b: Some users report insufficient heat for searing meats.

cont.entity_a: Good alternative for those unable to use outdoor grills.
Grill scratches easily and may require careful cleaning.
Effective for Korean BBQ style grilling.
cont.entity_b: Effective for cooking burgers and hot dogs.

cont.entity_a: Some issues with smoke alarms if used without ventilation.

cont.entity_b: Great for quick meals without using the stove.
